# readFolders

retrieve all folders under an app

## Usage
```js
await dataverseConnector.readFolders()
```

## Parameters
void

## Returns
```
StructuredFolders
```

Example:
```json
{
  "kjzl6kcym7w8y6elgcddb6kukqdexpex8vhalo1y5yn3vwfw424slewqurxirza": {
    "options": {
      "encryptedSymmetricKey": "",
      "decryptionConditions": "_",
      "encrypted": "3rSpNDU165BBtlwaolzPFKcsRcP4mvqBc_Wt8UHcz32xTapeaVCBiQm3UDGPsNWaq2HdHMlq5m6Byi9rwl8W6IkgqZYCm6gQ__S4Yxo9HhNXGUZxd9aoT3B1iXfhimWw",
      "folderName": "Untitled",
      "folderDescription": ""
    },
    "app": "fxy001",
    "model": [
      "kjzl6hvfrbw6c9k4u7fjs3guaasf2rt7s7hdo263xo84irab7pne5mfjwsxqc8z",
      "kjzl6hvfrbw6ca4r7cdi7adbmlu4dtuau3wqtndzx9owppolxik7hxk8fwcs4jx"
    ],
    "folderType": 1,
    "createdAt": "2023-05-29T03:18:38.437Z",
    "updatedAt": "2023-06-02T09:18:42.810Z",
    "folderId": "kjzl6kcym7w8y6elgcddb6kukqdexpex8vhalo1y5yn3vwfw424slewqurxirza",
    "contentFolderIds": [
      "kjzl6kcym7w8y61z6m4okt9vmciwayg6vd42lv1t55gyyiruzoeqkl5gqkrzonj"
    ],
    "mirrors": {
      "kjzl6kcym7w8y8cxj4zlztb7s9lfi6wy1vfoibvrkpk34duqczl0vogzc8mw3os": {
        "mirrorId": "kjzl6kcym7w8y8cxj4zlztb7s9lfi6wy1vfoibvrkpk34duqczl0vogzc8mw3os",
        "mirrorFile": {
          "content": {
            "text": "hello",
            "images": [
              "https://bafkreib76wz6wewtkfmp5rhm3ep6tf4xjixvzzyh64nbyge5yhjno24yl4.ipfs.w3s.link"
            ],
            "videos": [],
            "createdAt": "2023-06-02T03:19:14.539Z",
            "encrypted": "{\"text\":false,\"images\":false,\"videos\":false}",
            "updatedAt": "2023-06-02T03:19:14.539Z",
            "appVersion": "0.0.1"
          },
          "indexFileId": "kjzl6kcym7w8y8cxj4zlztb7s9lfi6wy1vfoibvrkpk34duqczl0vogzc8mw3os",
          "comment": { "mirrorName": "fxy001_post", "note": "", "tags": [] },
          "fileType": 0,
          "contentId": "kjzl6kcym7w8y96ke4t31i4hk32c7u5qedpk5dudwhu4vnjc3kzdeeq3tpfh8yf",
          "createdAt": "2023-06-02T03:19:15.975Z",
          "updatedAt": "2023-06-02T03:19:15.975Z",
          "appVersion": "0.2.0",
          "contentType": "kjzl6hvfrbw6c7gkypf9654o0vu1jd1q85fcnyrpc1koobuys71zhp0m7kbmrvs"
        },
        "folderId": "kjzl6kcym7w8y6elgcddb6kukqdexpex8vhalo1y5yn3vwfw424slewqurxirza",
        "bucketId": "kjzl6kcym7w8y61z6m4okt9vmciwayg6vd42lv1t55gyyiruzoeqkl5gqkrzonj"
      },
      ...
    },
    "mirrorsLocked": false
  },
  "kjzl6kcym7w8y50jo1wsu9x8p13l98amxnc182dfziguxo19l5qltwsjtext19x": {
    ...
  }
}
```
Under `mirrors` are the files in the folder.
